short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch videos in a popup while browsing the web. Watch your favorite videos without losing focus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our Google Chrome extension, you can watch your favorite videos without having to stay on the tab where the video is playing. Simply fix the video in a popup and continue browsing the internet while you watch. 

Make the most of your video viewing experience without sacrificing productivity.

Our tool is easy to use and fully customizable. You can adjust the size of the popup according to your preferences, choose its position on the screen, and more.

Additionally, it supports any site with videos, so you can use it on different platforms.

Stop wasting time switching between tabs. 

Try our extension now and enjoy the freedom to browse or carry out daily tasks while watching your favorite videos!
